scripts.dev: rimraf dist/ && concurrently 'npm run dev -w widgets' 'npm run dev -w my-app'
scripts.pre-build: concurrently 'npm run wasm:async' 'npm run wasm:sum' 'npm run build -w widgets'
scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && npm run pre-build && npm run build -w my-app
scripts.vercel-build: amazon-linux-extras install rust1 && npm run build
